None.Name: Infused Shapeshifter
None.Description: Infects the targeted friendly or hostile unit with the Twilight Curse and immediately transforms it into a Twilight Bug. Due to the transformation's boost the Bug will at first deal 30% more damage for 20 seconds. Restricted to units with a maximum requirement of 2 orbs and 200 power costs. Reusable every 30 seconds.
